1209870.name: The Gladhollow Nasties
1209870.description:
It goes by many names. The Gladhollow Grin, the Jackanape, the Gurumapa. A beast that stalks the forest by night, sniffing and snuffling after naughty citizens to devour.

It will take cunning, stealth, and strategy to survive long enough to untangle a mystery that twists through one wooded village and multiple despicable generations.

Try to stay alive and discover the stories of the sinful, pernicious, malicious morsels themselves: The Gladhollow Nasties.
